title._content: ["Ormstom," John Edward Aldred house, 1 East Beach Drive, Glen Cove, New York. (LOC)

description._content: Johnston, Frances Benjamin,, 1864-1952,, photographer. ["Ormstom," John Edward Aldred house, 1 East Beach Drive, Glen Cove, New York. Fountain] [1924] 1 photograph : glass lantern slide, hand-colored ; 3.25 x 4 in. Notes: Site History. House architecture: Bertram Grovesnor Goodhue, 1913-1916. Landscape: Olmsted Brothers. Today: Garden not extant, house today St. Josephat's Monestary. Title, date, and subject information provided by Sam Watters, 2011. Forms part of: Garden and historic house lecture series in the Frances Benjamin Johnston Collection (Library of Congress). Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.16165 Call Number: LC-J717-X99- 8
